verses.verse: To the chief Musician <S%H5329><s%> <S%H8764><s%>, Altaschith <S%H516><s%> <S%H8686><s%>, A Psalm <S%H4210><s%> or Song <S%H7892><s%> of Asaph <S%H623><s%>. Unto thee, O 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>, do we give thanks <S%H3034><s%> <S%H8689><s%>, unto thee do we give thanks <S%H3034><s%> <S%H8689><s%>: for that thy name <S%H8034><s%> is near <S%H7138><s%> thy wondrous works <S%H6381><s%> <S%H8737><s%> declare <S%H5608><s%> <S%H8765><s%>.
When I shall receive <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the congregation <S%H4150><s%> I will judge <S%H8199><s%> <S%H8799><s%> uprightly <S%H4339><s%>.

The earth <S%H776><s%> and all the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8802><s%> thereof are dissolved <S%H4127><s%> <S%H8737><s%>: I bear up <S%H8505><s%> <S%H8765><s%> the pillars <S%H5982><s%> of it. Selah <S%H5542><s%>.

I said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%> unto the fools <S%H1984><s%> <S%H8802><s%>, Deal not foolishly <S%H1984><s%> <S%H8799><s%>: and to the wicked <S%H7563><s%>, Lift not up <S%H7311><s%> <S%H8686><s%> the shofar <S%H7161><s%>:
Lift not up <S%H7311><s%> <S%H8686><s%> your shofar <S%H7161><s%> on high <S%H4791><s%>: speak <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8762><s%> not with a stiff <S%H6277><s%> neck <S%H6677><s%>.
For promotion <S%H7311><s%> <S%H8687><s%> <S%H8676><s%> <S%H2022><s%> cometh neither from the east <S%H4161><s%>, nor from the west <S%H4628><s%>, nor from the south <S%H4057><s%>.
But 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> is the judge <S%H8199><s%> <S%H8802><s%>: he putteth down <S%H8213><s%> <S%H8686><s%> one, and setteth up <S%H7311><s%> <S%H8686><s%> another.

For in the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> there is a cup <S%H3563><s%>, and the wine <S%H3196><s%> is red <S%H2560><s%> <S%H8804><s%>; it is full <S%H4392><s%> of mixture <S%H4538><s%>; and he poureth out <S%H5064><s%> <S%H8686><s%> of the same <S%H2088><s%>: but the dregs <S%H8105><s%> thereof, all the wicked <S%H7563><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%> shall wring them out <S%H4680><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and drink <S%H8354><s%> <S%H8799><s%> them.
But I will declare <S%H5046><s%> <S%H8686><s%> for ever <S%H5769><s%>; I will sing praises <S%H2167><s%> <S%H8762><s%> to the 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> of Ya`akov <S%H3290><s%>.

All the shofars <S%H7161><s%> of the wicked <S%H7563><s%> also will I cut off <S%H1438><s%> <S%H8762><s%>; but the shofars <S%H7161><s%> of the righteous <S%H6662><s%> shall be exalted <S%H7311><s%> <S%H8783><s%>.
